content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: black_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "black_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 16}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 56, "index": 26}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 55, "index": 36}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft black_terracotta, I first need to craft black dye. I can use the ink_sac at slot 42 to craft black dye, so I'll move it into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "black_banner", "quantity": 9, "index": 16}, {"type": "chiseled_polished_blackstone", "quantity": 56, "index": 26}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 55, "index": 36}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 39}, {"type": "rabbit", "quantity": 22, "index": 40}]
thought: I have crafted the black dye, so I will move it to a free slot (eg., 11)
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

thought: To craft black_terracotta, I need to place 1 black dye in the center of the crafting table, and terracotta in all other slots. I have 8 terracotta in slot 39, and so I will move one into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1
